Millions have used Clover to chat, date, or find long-lasting relationships. Install the Clover Dating App now to connect with women or men in your area! ğŸ˜

You can find people who are looking for short or long term dating, who work in the same industry you do, or who share your awesome interests. Get as specific as you want!

"One of the 10 best dating apps for Android."
â€“ Android Authority

"Itâ€™s centered around your needs and desires."
â€“ Mashable

"All the goodies of other dating apps mixed into one."
â€“ AskMen

Use search filters to find your type
No lengthy questionnaires
Set up real dates fast with On-Demand Dating
Take our fun "20 questions" quiz & see what other singles like
Join chat rooms and meet single men & women with common interests
Find local events, parties and online meetups

"The speediest dating app yet."
â€“ Digital Trends

From friendship to dating to finding love, the Clover Dating App will connect you to people who are looking for the same. Whether youâ€™re looking for straight, bisexual, lesbian or gay relationships we've got you covered ğŸ³ï¸â€ğŸŒˆ

"Clover's "Mixers" are like 90s chat rooms."
â€“ Bustle

More Features:
Filter by relationship intention: looking for friends, dating or something serious
Search people by body type, height, ethnicity, occupation and more
Promote your Instagram and Twitter on your profile
See who faves you & keep track of who you faved
Share photo messages
Import photos from your Camera or Facebook
Control who can see your online status and location
Limit contact from specific age ranges and locations
Post up to 100 profile pictures
Organize a list of your faves

Clover is free to download and use. However, we also offer an optional subscription package (including a free 7 day trial) and non-subscription, single and multi-use paid features (Boosts).

Give Clover a try and let us set you up on a real date tonight!
